reviews.text: Amazing stay! The apartment was spotless and check-in was smooth. Highly recommended.
Great location and comfortable bed. WiFi could be slightly faster but overall very good.
Perfect for a business trip. Quiet, modern, and walking distance to many great restaurants.
Nice apartment but check-in was delayed by 30 minutes. Otherwise fine.
Absolutely loved it. The balcony view was stunning. Will book again soon!
